text: Cheers to the first Celebrity Big Brother winner! Marissa Jaret Winokur took home the $ 250, 000 grand prize on Sunday, February 25 — with her BFF Ross Mathews by her side. The houseguests immediately clicked on the CBS series, and agreed to have each other ’ s backs until the very end. So much so, that Winokur chose him to be in the final two with her even though the TV personality had a very big chance at winning. “ I had to choose Ross. Listen, my whole game was about trying to stay as true and honest to everybody as I possibly could so the idea of not choosing him was not an option. He saved me against Brandi [ Glanville ], a friend of his from the outside world. And he saved me against James [ Maslow ] who
